trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> objects.
This class represents a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> objects stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
You can retrieve a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> by using either an index into the collection or the label of a grid item in the collection that you access through the indexer.
Gets the number of grid items in the collection.
The number of grid items in the collection.
Specifies that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItemCollection"></xref> has no entries.
Returns an enumeration of all the grid items in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItemCollection"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> at the specified index.
The index of the grid item to return.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> at the specified index.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItem"></xref> with the matching label.
A string value to match to a grid item label
The grid item whose label matches the label parameter.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
`false` in all cases.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridItemCollection"></xref>.
